group_1.narration: We got caught up in another@mysterious space after chasing those two.
The pair suddenly vanished@and managed to escape from us.

group_1.textRight: When they vanished, we ended up@back where we started…

group_1.textLeft: Chisato, Takina, are you guys okay?!

group_1.textRight: You disappeared out of nowhere.@Wait, was it that weird place again?
Yes… Well, it seems they managed@to get away again.
Those girls… Where on earth did they go?

group_1.textLeft: That area we just left… It's the same place@we fought before.

group_1.textRight: I just got a call from Mifuyu. She says they@ran into the culprits too.
She mentioned she was also caught@in a mysterious void.
Maybe it's their special magic.
Yes, it's the same as the special magic@that allows Kanagi to read minds.
I , too, have my own unique magic@born from my wish.

group_1.textLeft: Although, this seems like a bit much@for just one person's magic.

group_1.textRight: Yeah… Maybe they both have magic@that can manipulate space.
One of them can create an in-between area,@while the other moves items through it.
I think it's a combination of those things.
By that way, MY special magic is…@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:100301:motion_200][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Super Luck!
…But what are they trying to gain@from this…?
Hm… Ain't nothin' wrong with that!

group_1.textLeft: Does the end justify the means?

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, the playground equipment is gone@and so are lots of other things.

group_1.textLeft: Good grief… This reminds me of when@we were dealing with the Magius.

group_1.textRight: Uhh… It was a time when Touka and her friends@were being naughty…or something?
We've had a lot on our plate with them@until recently!

group_1.textLeft: It's a long story, so we'll leave it for now.

group_1.textRight: In any case, the perpetrator behind this@swapping case is all but certain.

group_1.textLeft: Yes… Whatever their aim is,@that part isn't in doubt.

group_1.textRight: Well either way, we still gotta@catch 'em, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: But what if they escape into@that strange area again…?

group_1.textRight: …I have an idea.

group_1.textLeft: …It looks like some other places@were swapped!

group_1.textRight: Let's go! We'll catch them this time!
Right!
No… I just want to hear what@they both have to say.
I mean, Lycoris bears responsibility for@how that terrorist incident turned out.
Besides, the idea of wanting to eliminate@evil isn't bad in itself, you know?

group_1.textLeft: …So you're planning on showing them mercy@and dying again, just like before?

group_1.textRight: That's not what I'm saying.
I just think maybe we can understand@each other, you know?

group_1.textLeft: Chisato, while I respect your will@to protect and value life,

group_1.textRight: Right. It's like I said, though.
Time is precious, and I don't feel good@about taking it away from people.
But I can't forgive those girls for stealing@away the things that people treasure.
…And that's why I wanna know what@they're doing this for.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think there's any way for us@to understand evildoers.

group_1.textRight: …Maybe real villains only exist in movies.
I don't know, though.
